name: browser-use
description: Execute natural language browser automation commands

functions.name: browser_command
functions.description: Control a browser using natural language instructions

prompt.description: The natural language instruction (e.g., 'go to google.com and search for OpenAI')

vision.description: Enable vision capabilities for supported models (optional)

examples.command: browser-use "go to google.com and search for OpenAI"

examples.description: Using vision to analyze a webpage
examples.command: browser-use "go to openai.com and tell me what you see" --model gemini --vision

examples.description: Running a check in headless mode
